com.cloudera.oryx.kmeans.computation.cluster

Class KSketchIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudera.oryx.kmeans.computation.cluster.KSketchIndex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class KSketchIndex
extends Object
implements Serializable
    An internal data structure that manages the locations of the current centers during k-means|| processing.
    See Also:
